transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan madam, ye block list mein hi tha.
Customer: Sir keh rahi thi aap koi block list mein hai. Agar hum itni calls aapko de de rahe hain, ek call aap miss kar sakte hain, do kar sakte hain lekin aap
Executive: Wo wo sochiye ye block list mein main kaise daal dunga, ye chala kaise gaya.
Customer: Sir kyunki ye promotional kyunki ye sir promotion wala number hota hai. To bahut jagah par aap access dete hain na jab apps ko access dete hain ki block incoming calls from promotional is tarike se ki emails promotional emails text calls bhi aani chahiye. To us time pe aise jo numbers hote hain na wo automatically block list ho jate hain. To wo aapko dekhna padta hai.
Executive: Wahi main baar baar pareshan tha ki aap logon ki taraf se baar baar
Customer: Sir ye cheeze to ye cheeze to sir discuss karni hoti hai na. Aapne bataya nahi apne account manager ko just main abhi inse pooch hi rahi thi to unhone bataya ki maine
Executive: Neeraj ji se Neeraj naam nahi hoga.
Customer: Mani Manish Nane Manish. Manish Manish ji se meri baat hoti hai. Isse pehle bhi jo Yashika miss Yashika something thi unse bhi meri baat hui thi. To chaliye theek hai ab ye to mere
Customer: Nahi sir aap dekhiye agar aisi koi baat hoti hai aap detail mein agar poochhenge jaise aapne mujhe bataya to maine aapko bataya na ki ye is tarike se hota hai ye cheez aap agar apne account manager ko bhi aise bata de ki main ye problem face kar raha hun. To wo bhi aapko aise hi batate ab aapne mujhe batayi ye cheez
Executive: Itni bari se baat ho rahi hai. Har bari yahi baat hoti hai wo wo yahi baat bolte hain jo aapne bola hai ki aap call pick nahi kar rahe hain. Miss call aa raha hai.
Customer: Wo to chaliye maine ab aapko bataya to aapne dekh liya ki wo block list tha. Iske alawa subah aapki AI se related kuch aap pooch rahe the. Manish ne aapko ye bata diya. Theek hai fir Manish ne aapse ki aapka concern open ho gaya tha kyunki unki call miss ho gayi thi aapki call miss ho gayi thi to wo close kar dete hain. Fir wo jab aapko close kiya to aapne us pe no de diya hai. To maine isliye aapse baat ki ki aapne no diya hai bataye kya problem hai. Kya face kar rahe hain kya
Executive: Chaliye AI ke bare mein bata dijiye ki aisa kuch maine suna hai ki jo leads aate hain usko uska reply wagaira AI ka koi setup bana diya jaye to reply automatically wo deta rahega. Aisa hai kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi ha humne aapko option zarur de rakhe hain jab aap chat pe reply karne ke liye jate hain to waha pe aapko options milte hain ki aap kya kya abhi send kar sakte hain message mein. Jaise catalog link hello hi is tarike se aap message kar sakte hain. Proper tarike se AI aapke behalf pe message kare aisa bhi kuch tak nahi hum logon ko pata aur nahi aisa abhi filhal to aisa kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Maine suna tha to chat GPT mein balki maine isko search kiya to wo bhi bata raha hai ki hai aisa kar sakte hain aap IndiaMART mein.
Customer: Ji sir abhi sir mujhe is tarike ki sir abhi mujhe is bare mein koi knowledge nahi hai is tarike ki abhi mujhe koi knowledge nahi hai whenever kabhi hogi main definitely aapko inform kar dungi sab cheezon ke liye filhal ke liye aisa kuch bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ye shayad do function mein hota.
Customer: Hmm. Chaliye theek hai main dekh lunga. Iske alawa aap kyunki aapka concern fir se open ho gaya tha kyunki aapne us pe of course no diya tha that you are not satisfied theek hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To abhi aapki koi problem hai sir abhi kuch aur kuch janna hai aapko kuch aur cheez
Executive: Abhi filhal nahi hai.
Customer: Wo aapne unblock kar diya number apna?
Executive: Hmm unblock kar diya.
Customer: Theek hai sir main ye kabhi bhi aapko future mein kisi bhi tarike ki koi problem hoti hai to aap Manish se contact kar sakte hain aur aap mujhse bhi contact kar sakte hain theek hai same cheez ke liye. Ye number aapka hai?
Customer: Haan ye mera number hai aap mujhse bhi contact kar sakte hain discussion ke liye aur aapke jo account manager hain Manish aap unke sath better tarike se coordinate kar sakte hain agar aap unhe detail mein batayenge ki aap problem kya face kar rahe hain.
Executive: Agar koi specific koi wo hoga to main aapko phone karunga theek hai.
Customer: Bilkul sir. Thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's number was in the block list.

- Enquired about AI setup for automatic replies.

- Concern was reopened due to dissatisfaction.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the promotional call blocking.

- Executive clarified AI setup is not available.

- Customer unblocked the number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact executive if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- block list, ai, account manager, unblock, promotional calls

seller_categories.mcat_name: Polyethylene glycol and Propylene Glycol Eye Drop
